summary: IN THE LAST RECALL, I WENT TO THE DEALERSHIP IN GREER SC AS INSTRUCTED.  WHEN I CALLED ABOUT THE RECALL, I TOLD THE REPRESENTATIVE THAT MY DRIVER'S SIDE AIRBAG WAS ALREADY EXPELLED AND ASKED IF IT WOULD BE REPLACED.  SHE ASSURED ME THAT IT WOULD. THEY LAUGHED IN MY FACE AT THE DEALERSHIP, AND DID NOT REPLACE THE AIRBAG.
